name: Consecrate Spell
enabledFormula: "Aasimar, able to prepare or cast consecrate."

description.text: You infuse spells with heavenly power, drastically increasing their effectiveness against would-be heralds of evil.

sections.Benefit: A consecrated spell is treated as a maximized spell against evil creatures and creatures with the evil subtype. Against all other creatures, this feat does not modify the spell in any way (for example, a consecrated fireball acts as a normal fireball against neutral or good creatures). This feat does not stack with Maximize Spell.
